About_Clark.NAME: About Clark
About_Clark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage two times. Costs 1 less [E] per Frail you have.

AbstractSageCard.NAME: Abstract Sage Card
AbstractSageCard.DESCRIPTION: ABSTRACT CLASS! THIS SHOULD NEVER BE DISPLAYED!
AbstractSageCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: These values are for speech bubbles and updating the brew variable
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I can only play this if I have no Flight!
I can only play this if I am flying!
I can only play this if I have a potion!

Accumulation.NAME: Accumulation
Accumulation.DESCRIPTION: Air. NL Gain [E] and lose !M! Flight at the start of each turn.

Alchemy_Expert.NAME: Alchemy Expert
Alchemy_Expert.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use a potion, gain !M! Artifact.
Alchemy_Expert.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you use a potion, gain !M! Artifact.

Ancient_Poison.NAME: Ancient Poison
Ancient_Poison.DESCRIPTION: Artifact no longer negates Poison NL for this combat. NL Each enemy gains Poison equal to their Artifact.
Ancient_Poison.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Artifact no longer negates Poison NL for this combat. NL Each enemy gains Poison equal to their Artifact + !M!.

Anti_Ancient_Attack.NAME: Anti Ancient Attack
Anti_Ancient_Attack.DESCRIPTION: Double the enemy's Artifact. NL Then deal !D! damage per Artifact on the field.

Armor_Brew.NAME: Armor Brew
Armor_Brew.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Brew a Block Potion NL in !BRW! turns.
Armor_Brew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Brew an upgraded Block Potion NL in !BRW! turns.

Bookworm.NAME: Bookworm
Bookworm.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] every time NL you play a card NL that costs X.

Bouncing_Strike.NAME: Bouncing Strike
Bouncing_Strike.DESCRIPTION: Gain !MISC! Frail. NL Gain !M! Flight. Deal damage equal to the sum of your Frail and Flight.
Bouncing_Strike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !MISC! Frail. NL Gain !M! Flight. Deal damage equal to the product of your Frail and Flight.

Burning_Flask.NAME: Burning Flask
Burning_Flask.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. If you carry potions, discard one at random and deal !M! extra damage.

Byrd_Feather_Preview.NAME: Byrd Feather
Byrd_Feather_Preview.DESCRIPTION: RELIC! NL If you have 1 or 2 Flight at the start of your turn, set it to !M!.

Cane_Strike.NAME: Cane Strike
Cane_Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals double damage if you are Frail.

Catch_Me_If_You_Can.NAME: Catch Me If You Can
Catch_Me_If_You_Can.DESCRIPTION: Air. Prevent the next !M! times you would lose Flight until the start of your next turn.

Crank.NAME: Crank
Crank.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Artifact, draw !M! card.
Crank.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Artifact, draw cards equal to the enemies Artifact.

Cultist_Form.NAME: Cultist Form
Cultist_Form.DESCRIPTION: Lose !MISC! Flight. NL Apply 1 Disoriented to a random enemy !M! times.

Deadly_Contraption.NAME: Deadly Contraption
Deadly_Contraption.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies gain !M! Artifact. At the end of your turn, enemies are dealt !MISC! damage per Artifact on them.

Endless_Fear.NAME: Endless Fear
Endless_Fear.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use a non-Fear Potion, obtain a Fear Potion.

Energetic_Brew.NAME: Energetic Brew
Energetic_Brew.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Brew an Energy Potion NL in !BRW! turns.
Energetic_Brew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Brew an upgraded Energy Potion NL in !BRW! turns.

Extra_Portion.NAME: Extra Portion
Extra_Portion.DESCRIPTION: The next potion is applied twice this turn.
Extra_Portion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next !M! potions are applied twice this turn.

Fire_Brew.NAME: Fire Brew
Fire_Brew.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Brew a Fire Potion NL in !BRW! turns.
Fire_Brew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Brew an upgraded Fire Potion NL in !BRW! turns.

Fly.NAME: Fly
Fly.DESCRIPTION: If you are flying: NL Gain !B! Block. NL Otherwise: NL Gain !M! Flight.

Flying_Carpet_Preview.NAME: Flying Carpet
Flying_Carpet_Preview.DESCRIPTION: RELIC! NL Gain !M! Flight at the start of your second turn.

Flying_Cauldron.NAME: Flying Cauldron
Flying_Cauldron.DESCRIPTION: Air. NL Gain !M! Brewing. NL Exhaust.
Flying_Cauldron.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you are flying: NL Gain !M! Brewing. NL Otherwise: NL Gain !M! Flight. NL Exhaust.

Folded_Carpet.NAME: Folded Carpet
Folded_Carpet.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block per Flight you have.

Gearwheel_Master.NAME: Gearwheel Master
Gearwheel_Master.DESCRIPTION: EVERYBODY gains !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

Grounded_Strike.NAME: Grounded Strike
Grounded_Strike.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Flight. NL Deal !D! damage.

How_To_Befriend_A_Turtle.NAME: How To Befriend A Turtle
How_To_Befriend_A_Turtle.DESCRIPTION: Gain X Block. NL Gain X [E].
How_To_Befriend_A_Turtle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain X + !B! Block. NL Gain X [E].

How_To_Charm_A_Sentry.NAME: How To Charm A Sentry
How_To_Charm_A_Sentry.DESCRIPTION: Deal X times !D! damage. The enemy gains X Artifact.

How_To_Feed_Apes.NAME: How To Feed Apes
How_To_Feed_Apes.DESCRIPTION: Brew one of the NL possible Potions NL in !BRW! -X turns. NL Exhaust.

How_To_Greet_Byrds.NAME: How To Greet Byrds
How_To_Greet_Byrds.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Set your Flight to X. NL Exhaust.
How_To_Greet_Byrds.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain X Flight. NL Exhaust.

How_To_Murder_Ants.NAME: How To Murder Ants
How_To_Murder_Ants.DESCRIPTION: Air. NL Deal X damage to a random enemy !M! times.

How_To_Poke_At_Slimes.NAME: How To Poke At Slimes
How_To_Poke_At_Slimes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! -X Frail. NL Gain X [E].

How_To_Talk_To_Spiders.NAME: How To Talk To Spiders
How_To_Talk_To_Spiders.DESCRIPTION: Apply X Poison. NL Brew a Poison Potion NL in !BRW! -X turns.

How_To_Wake_Lyons.NAME: How To Wake Lyons
How_To_Wake_Lyons.DESCRIPTION: Brew a NL Steroid Potion NL in !BRW! -X turns. NL Exhaust.
How_To_Wake_Lyons.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Brew a NL Steroid Potion NL in !BRW! -X turns.

How_To_Warm_Elephants.NAME: How To Warm Elephants
How_To_Warm_Elephants.DESCRIPTION: Brew an NL Explosive Potion NL in !BRW! -X turns.
How_To_Warm_Elephants.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Brew an NL upgraded Explosive Potion NL in !BRW! -X turns.

Lecture.NAME: Lecture
Lecture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage per X cost card played this combat.

Light_Weighted.NAME: Light-Weighted
Light_Weighted.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Frail. NL Gain that much Flight. NL Exhaust.
Light_Weighted.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose all Frail. NL Gain that much NL Flight + !M!. NL Exhaust.

Lunchtime.NAME: Lunchtime!
Lunchtime.DESCRIPTION: Air. Lose !M! Flight and brew all potions immediately.

Mechanics_Break.NAME: Mechanics Break!
Mechanics_Break.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The target enemy gains !M! Artifact.

Meditation.NAME: Meditation
Meditation.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Flight. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

Noxious_Wave.NAME: Noxious Wave
Noxious_Wave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Trigger Poison on this enemy.
Noxious_Wave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Trigger Poison on this enemy twice.

On_Fire.NAME: On Fire
On_Fire.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play !M! cards in a single turn, obtain a Fire Potion.
On_Fire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play !M! cards in a single turn, obtain an upgraded Fire Potion.

On_The_Head.NAME: On The Head
On_The_Head.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are flying: NL Draw !M! card NL and gain [E].

Perpetuum_Mobile.NAME: Perpetuum Mobile
Perpetuum_Mobile.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Play it for free if it costs !MISC!.
Perpetuum_Mobile.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Play it for free if it costs !MISC! or X.

Pincer_Attack.NAME: Pincer Attack
Pincer_Attack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage per Artifact the enemy has.

Pincer_Repair.NAME: Pincer Repair
Pincer_Repair.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The enemy gains NL !M! Artifact.

Potion_Explosion.NAME: Potion Explosion
Potion_Explosion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies per potion you used this turn.

Potion_Trance.NAME: Potion Trance
Potion_Trance.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card whenever you use a potion this turn. You cannot gain energy this turn.
Potion_Trance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards whenever you use a potion this turn. You cannot gain energy this turn.

Pour_Tar_Pitch.NAME: Pour Tar Pitch
Pour_Tar_Pitch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are flying, this affects ALL enemies.

Quackster.NAME: Quackster
Quackster.DESCRIPTION: Brew a random Potion in !BRW! turns. NL Exhaust.
Quackster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Brew a random Potion in !BRW! turns.

Refine.NAME: Refine
Refine.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade a random unupgraded potion you are holding.
Refine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all unupgraded potions you are holding.

Riches.NAME: Riches!!!
Riches.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use an upgraded potion, obtain a random unupgraded potion.

Rickety_Defense.NAME: Rickety Defense
Rickety_Defense.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Frail, gain !M! Block per Frail you have.

Step_Back.NAME: Step Back
Step_Back.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you are flying: Gain [E] [E] . NL Otherwise: NL Gain !M! Flight.

Study.NAME: Study
Study.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Put !MISC! card from your hand on top of your draw pile.
Study.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL You may put !MISC! card from your hand on top of your draw pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: put on top of your draw pile.

Swoop_Down.NAME: Swoop Down
Swoop_Down.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage per Flight you have. NL Then lose !M! Flight.
Swoop_Down.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage per Flight you have.

Taste_This_One.NAME: Taste This One
Taste_This_One.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use a potion, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

Toxic_Chains.NAME: Toxic Chains
Toxic_Chains.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Frail. NL Apply that much Poison to ALL enemies.
Toxic_Chains.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose all Frail. NL Apply that much Poison + !M! to ALL enemies.

Turn_Around.NAME: Turn Around
Turn_Around.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Frail. NL Deal !D! damage per Frail you have.

Vigorous_Body.NAME: Vigorous Body
Vigorous_Body.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Artifact of you gets triggered, gain !M! Strength.
Vigorous_Body.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Artifact of you or an enemy gets triggered, gain !M! Strength.

Viral_Strike.NAME: Viral Strike
Viral_Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply Virus and !M! Poison.
